Hi! I am an applied ML graduate working on the frontier of research and business. With M.S. in ML and certified AWS knowledge, practical experience in diverse ML/DL areas and strong communication skills, I am passionate about using AI to solve challenging business problems and create value. Currently, I study at SCUT, where I develop cutting-edge ML solutions to stock price prediction.
